briefdescription.para: Defination of a procedure in the type t_fluidThermoProperty. to check the temperature limitations.

detaileddescription.para:
This subroutine is called as required to check the temperature of given element is within the given limits as a single phase flow.
this
a cell element with udf property

briefdescription.para: Defination of a procedure in the type t_fluidThermoProperty. to update the thermal properties based on the known temperature.

detaileddescription.para:
This subroutine is called as required to update all thermal properties from the known temperature (dimensional or dimensionless).
this
a cell element with udf property
dim
an optional indicator of dimensional /dimensionless T. Exsiting of dim indicates the known/given T is dimensional. Otherwise, not.

briefdescription.para: Defination of a procedure in the type t_fluidThermoProperty. to update the thermal properties based on the known enthalpy.

detaileddescription.para:
This subroutine is called as required to update all thermal properties from the known enthalpy (dimensionless only).
this
a cell element with udf property

briefdescription.para: Defination of a procedure in the type t_fluidThermoProperty. to update the thermal properties based on the known enthalpy per unit mass.

detaileddescription.para:
This subroutine is called as required to update all thermal properties from the known enthalpy per unit mass (dimensionless only).
this
a cell element with udf property

briefdescription.para: Defination of a procedure in the type t_fluidThermoProperty. to print out the thermal properties at the given element.

detaileddescription.para:
This subroutine is called as required to print out thermal properties for degbugging.
this
a cell element with udf property
unit
iotype
v_list
iostat
iomsg

briefdescription.para: Sort out the user given thermal property table based on the temperature from small to big.

detaileddescription.para:
This subroutine is called locally once reading in the given thermal table.
list
the thermal table element array

briefdescription.para: Check the monotonicity of the $\rho h$ along $h$ and $T$.

detaileddescription.para:
This subroutine is called locally once building up the thermal property relationships. Non-monotonicity could happen in fluids at supercritical pressure when inproper reference temperature is given.
none
NA

briefdescription.para: Building up the thermal property relations from the given table. This subroutine is called once after reading the table. [mpi] all ranks.
Building up the thermal property relations from defined relations.

detaileddescription.para:
This subroutine is called once after defining the relations.
none
NA

briefdescription.para: Write out the rebuilt thermal property relations.

detaileddescription.para:
This subroutine is called for testing.
none
NA

briefdescription.para: Identify table or equations for thermal properties based on input fluid material.

detaileddescription.para:
This subroutine is called once in setting up thermal relations. [mpi] all ranks
none
NA

Scope: mpi called-freq xdomain module all once specified private
fl
flow type
tm
thermo type

briefdescription.para: The main code for thermal property initialisation. Scope: mpi called-freq xdomain all once all.
